page.title: 06Consumerism in Alveston
page.content: In this survey we went round six classes to find out what percentage of people had what.The six classes together had 161 children .The way we chose the different objects is by the class chosing what luxuries they have and would like to have. Microwave 25% HI-FI system 58% Computer 51% Video camera/recorder47% Dishwasher23% TV with teletext 28% swim pool 3% push button telephone28% 1 car 40% 2 cars 41% more cars 8% 0 cars 11% four or more bedrooms in your house54% The next test was almost the same but for personal luxuries that is just yours not shared with a brouther or sister.These things were decided in the same way. Personal stereo 48% Camera 64% Own Computer 15% Television 35% Bedroom 56%
